import React, {useState} from "react" import axios from "axios" const NewProduct = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [desc, setDesc] = useState(""); const [atype,setAtype] = useState(""); const [price, setPrice] = useState(""); const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(""); const [rating, setRating] = useState(""); const [image, setImage] = useState("null"); const createProduct = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios.post("http://localhost:8000/product-create/", { name, desc, atype, price, quantity, rating, image }) .then((res) => console.log(res)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) } return (
